name: Ninja Gaiden 3 Collector's Edition
summary:
Ninja Gaiden 3 Collector's Edition

Featuring a new story, new gameplay and new modes, NINJA GAIDEN 3 marks a new direction in this fan-favorite franchise. The game will also feature online multiplayer, both co-op and competitive, that will add a completely new experience to NINJA GAIDEN.
